White_Male_20s: Maintain the person's fair complexion with pinkish undertones, high broad forehead, very short thinning dark brown hair, and distinctive wide smile wearing thin-rimmed glasses.
White_Female_20s: Maintain the person's heart-shaped face, large dark almond eyes, full well-defined lips, and long straight ash-blonde hair.
Black_Male_20s: Maintain the person's deep brown skin tone, wide expressive smile with prominent cheekbones and nasolabial folds, and broad nasal features.
Black_Female_20s: Maintain the person's rich medium-brown skin tone, high prominent forehead, large almond-shaped dark eyes, broad nose with a low bridge, and full, well-defined lips.
EastAsian_Male_20s: Maintain the person's fair skin, oval face shape with a soft jawline, almond-shaped dark brown eyes, and distinctive messy black hair with a fringe.
EastAsian_Female_20s: Maintain the person's round face shape, almond-shaped dark eyes, and straight black hair with distinctive full bangs.
SoutheastAsian_Male_20s: Maintain the person's round face shape with prominent cheeks, broad nose, and wide smile with full lips. Ensure the medium-tan skin tone with warm undertones and almond-shaped dark eyes are accurately preserved.
SoutheastAsian_Female_20s: Maintain the person's East Asian identity, characterized by their warm-toned light skin, almond-shaped dark eyes, soft oval face, and natural dark hair texture.
Indian_Male_20s: Maintain the person's medium-tan South Asian complexion, oval face shape, dark brown almond-shaped eyes, and signature thick black hair with a side-swept fringe.
Indian_Female_20s: Maintain the person's medium-to-deep brown skin tone, oval face shape, almond-shaped dark eyes with thick arched brows, and the distinctive small nose ring in the right nostril.
MiddleEastern_Male_20s: Maintain the person's medium olive skin tone, large almond-shaped dark eyes with thick eyebrows, and his specific facial hair pattern of a thin mustache and small goatee.
MiddleEastern_Female_20s: Maintain the person's identity by preserving their warm olive skin tone, almond-shaped dark brown eyes, and signature voluminous, tight dark curly hair.
Latino_Male_20s: Maintain the person's olive skin tone, deep-set almond dark eyes under straight brows, and their specific facial structure with a slightly rounded nose and fuller lower lip.
Latino_Female_20s: Maintain the person's medium-brown skin tone with warm undertones, oval face shape with high cheekbones, almond-shaped dark brown eyes, and shoulder-length black hair.
